text: 5.13 2 Te 3.11 Pen tap ogɨnap sek anɨgɨl gɨpal. Kɨli tap ogɨnap abe yɨlɨk nɨŋɨd, yokɨp kal ak kal ak gɨñub ajɨpal. Kɨli pen yɨlɨk gup anɨb ak nep ma gɨpal, tap okok kuŋay nep gɨpal. Kɨli takaw ñɨg lɨl, takaw yepɨs anɨgɨpal anɨgɨpal agɨlɨg mɨdebal. Takaw okok kuŋay yɨbɨl apal, chɨn agep tek ma mɨdeb.
